short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides helpful climate tips for middle-schoolers to help their parents make a difference in climate change.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens up a side bar of helpful tips for you and your family to spread awareness and mitigate the impacts of climate change!
